mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, (SELECT upload FROM account_device_list_speed_monitor WHERE account_device_list_id = t1.id AND create_time = MAX(t2.create_time) LIMIT 1) now_upload, (SELECT download FROM account_device_list_speed_monitor WHERE account_device_list_id = t1.id AND create_time = MAX(t2.create_time) LIMIT 1) now_download, sum(t2.upload * 60 * 5) total_upload,sum(t2.download * 60 * 5) total_download FROM account_device_list t1 LEFT JOIN account_device_list_speed_monitor t2 ON t1.id = t2.account_device_list_id AND to_days(t2.create_time) = to_days(now()) ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY t1.id

SELECT count(DISTINCT t.id ) totalDevices, sum(IF ( t.`status` = 1, 1, 0 )) onlineDevices, sum(t.totalUpload) totalUpload , sum(t.totalDownload) totalDownload, sum(t.lastUpload) totalLastUpload, sum(t.lastDownload) totalLastDownload FROM ( SELECT t1.id,t1.`status`,sum(t2.upload * 5 * 60) totalUpload,sum(t2.download * 5 * 60) totalDownload, (SELECT upload FROM account_device_list_speed_monitor WHERE account_device_list_id = t1.id AND event_time = CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:'),FLOOR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%i')/10),IF(FLOOR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%i')/5)%2=1,5,0),':00') ) lastUpload, (SELECT download FROM account_device_list_speed_monitor WHERE account_device_list_id = t1.id AND event_time = CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:'),FLOOR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%i')/10),IF(FLOOR(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%i')/5)%2=1,5,0),':00') ) lastDownload FROM account_device_list t1 INNER JOIN account_device_list_speed_monitor t2 ON t1.id = t2.account_device_list_id WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND TO_DAYS(t2.create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY t1.id ) t
